name: Admin Console Release 25.5.0
description: This release of the Admin Console brings you a few new features and some improvements, see below for details on some of the more notable changes applied to the Admin Console.

IMPROVED.text: Reset Password URL field in the Customer Profile section of Admin Console now has a default value
Reset password validation rules in the Customer Profile section are same as the rules defined in Data Schema.
Account Subscription Details are available in the Billing section of Admin Console.
